movies.title: Barbarella
movies.description: In the distant future, a highly sexual woman is assigned with finding and stopping the evil Durand-Durand. Along the way, she encounters various unusual people.

movies.title: Blade Runner
movies.description: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

movies.title: Dune
movies.description: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

movies.title: Ex Machina
movies.description: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a breath-taking humanoid A.I.
